identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a luxury jewelry admin panel that feels like a high-end cockpit, not a spreadsheet.
anti_patterns: No generic 'Inter' everywhere - use Cormorant Garamond for headers
No flat gray backgrounds - use deep rich textures
No default Shadcn cards - use Glassmorphism
No boring equal-width grids - use Bento layouts

layout.spacing: Relaxed - use p-6 or p-8 for cards

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Modify 'tailwind.config.js' to use the 'Midnight Jewel' palette. Use CSS variables in 'index.css' for the 'dark' class. Ensure 'darkMode' is set to 'class'.
2. FONT SETUP: Keep 'Cormorant Garamond' and 'Inter' in App.css. Apply 'font-serif' to all headings (h1-h3) and 'font-sans' to body/tables.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Add a global background to 'body' in index.css: 'bg-[#020408] text-slate-100'. Add a subtle noise texture if possible.

4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Go into 'src/components/ui/card.js' (or equivalent) and change the default style to use the Glassmorphism utility defined above (bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-md). Do not use solid white backgrounds.
5. LAYOUT: Create a 'Layout.js' component with a fixed glass sidebar and a scrollable main area. content area must have padding 'p-8'.
6. DASHBOARD: Implement a Bento Grid layout. Top row: 4 KPI cards (Glass). Middle row: Large Sales Chart (Col-span-2) + Recent Orders (Col-span-1). Bottom row: Top Products.
7. CHARTS: Use 'Recharts'. Customize the 'ResponsiveContainer' to fit the glass cards. Use the gold/emerald/blue palette for lines/bars.
8. MICRO-INTERACTIONS: Add 'hover:scale-[1.02]' to all cards. Add 'active:scale-95' to buttons. Use 'sonner' for toast notifications.
9. TABLES: heavily customize shadcn table. Remove internal borders, use 'hover:bg-white/5' for rows. Header should be uppercase tracking-widest text-xs text-muted-foreground.
10. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
11. LOGIN: Create a split-screen login page. Left side: High-res Jewelry Image with overlay. Right side: Glass form centered.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
NEVER use transparent backgrounds without a blur or scrim.
